00012 #define BLOCK_NONE  0
00013 #define BLOCK_START 1
00014 #define BLOCK_END   2
00015 
00016 typedef struct udata_line_t {
00017   uint32_t codepoint;
00018   char category[2];
00019   uint32_t upper;
00020   uint32_t lower;
00021   uint32_t title;
00022   int block;
00023 } udata_line_t;
00024 
00025 char* tokenize(char** lp){
00026   char* l = *lp;
00027   char* r;
00028 
00029   while (*l && *l != '\n' && *l != ';'){
00030     l++;
00031   }
00032 
00033   r = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(l - *lp + 1);
00034   memcpy(r, *lp, l - *lp);
00035   r[l - *lp] = 0;
00036 
00037   if (*l == ';'){
00038     l++;
00039   }
00040   *lp = l;
00041   return r;
00042 }
00043 
00044 int ends_with(char* s, char* e){
00045   if (strlen(s) < strlen(e)){
00046     return 0;
00047   }
00048   s += strlen(s) - strlen(e);
00049   return strcmp(s, e) == 0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 udata_line_t* parse_line(char* line){
00053   udata_line_t* l = GC_NEW_ATOMIC(udata_line_t);
00054   char* s_codepoint = tokenize(&line);
00055   char* s_name = tokenize(&line);
00056   char* s_category = tokenize(&line);
00057   char* s_cclass = tokenize(&line);
00058   char* s_bdclass = tokenize(&line);
00059   char* s_dtype = tokenize(&line);
00060   char* s_ntv0 = tokenize(&line);
00061   char* s_ntv1 = tokenize(&line);
00062   char* s_ntv2 = tokenize(&line);
00063   char* s_bdmirror = tokenize(&line);
00064   char* s_oldname = tokenize(&line);
00065   char* s_comment = tokenize(&line);
00066   char* s_upper = tokenize(&line);
00067   char* s_lower = tokenize(&line);
00068   char* s_title = tokenize(&line);
00069 
00070   l->codepoint = strtol(s_codepoint, NULL, 16);
00071   memcpy(l->category, s_category, 2);
00072   if (*s_upper){
00073     l->upper = strtol(s_upper, NULL, 16);
00074   } else {
00075     l->upper = l->codepoint;
00076   }
00077   if (*s_lower){
00078     l->lower = strtol(s_lower, NULL, 16);
00079   } else {
00080     l->lower = l->codepoint;
00081   }
00082   if (*s_title){
00083     l->title = strtol(s_title, NULL, 16);
00084   } else {
00085     l->title = l->codepoint;
00086   }
00087   /*  if (strcmp(s_category, "Nd") == 0){
00088     l->digit = atol(s_ntv0);
00089     }*/
00090 
00091   if (ends_with(s_name, "First>")){
00092     l->block = BLOCK_START;
00093   } else if (ends_with(s_name, "Last>")){
00094     l->block = BLOCK_END;
00095   }
00096 
00097   return l;
00098 }

00100 uint32_t block_start;
00101 
00102 udata_entry_t database[17*65536];
00103 
00104 udata_entry_t* get_entry_for(uint32_t codepoint){
00105   return &(database[codepoint]);
00106 }
00107 
00108 void init_database(){
00109   uint32_t i;
00110   udata_entry_t* e;
00111 
00112   for (i = 0; i < 17*65536; i++){
00113       e = get_entry_for(i);
00114       e->category[0] = 'C';
00115       e->category[1] = 'n';
00116       e->upper_offset = 0;
00117       e->lower_offset = 0;
00118       e->title_offset = 0;    
00119   }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void process_line(udata_line_t* l){
00123   udata_entry_t* e;
00124   uint32_t i;
00125 
00126   switch (l->block) {
00127   case BLOCK_NONE:
00128     e = get_entry_for(l->codepoint);
00129     memcpy(e->category, l->category, 2);
00130     e->upper_offset = l->upper - l->codepoint;
00131     e->lower_offset = l->lower - l->codepoint;
00132     e->title_offset = l->title - l->codepoint;
00133 
00134     break;
00135   case BLOCK_START:
00136     block_start = l->codepoint;
00137     break;
00138   case BLOCK_END:
00139     for (i = block_start; i <= l->codepoint; i++){
00140       e = get_entry_for(i);
00141       memcpy(e->category, l->category, 2);
00142       e->upper_offset = 0;
00143       e->lower_offset = 0;
00144       e->title_offset = 0;
00145     }
00146     break;
00147   }
00148 }

00150 unsigned char property_type[17*65535];
00151 udata_entry_t distinct[256];
00152 int distinct_count = 0;
00153 
00154 void compact_props(){
00155   uint32_t i;
00156   int j;
00157   fprintf(stderr, "Compacting properties......");
00158 
00159   for (i = 0; i < 17*65536; i++){
00160     for (j = 0; j <= distinct_count; j++){
00161       if (memcmp(&distinct[j], &database[i], sizeof(udata_entry_t)) == 0){
00162         property_type[i] = j;
00163         goto next;
00164       }
00165     }
00166     j = distinct_count;
00167     fprintf(stderr, "\b\b\b%03d", j);
00168     memcpy(&distinct[j], &database[i], sizeof(udata_entry_t));
00169     property_type[i] = j;
00170     distinct_count++;
00171   next:;
00172   }
00173   fprintf(stderr, "...done\n");
00174 }
00175 
00176 #define FIRST_SIZE 17*256
00177 #define SECOND_SIZE 256
00178 
00179 int table_type[FIRST_SIZE];
00180 unsigned char tables[FIRST_SIZE][SECOND_SIZE];
00181 int tables_count = 0;
00182 
00183 void compact_tables(){
00184   uint32_t i;
00185   int j;
00186   fprintf(stderr, "Compacting tables.......");
00187 
00188   for (i = 0; i < FIRST_SIZE; i++){
00189     for (j = 0; j <= tables_count; j++){
00190       if (memcmp(tables[j], &property_type[i*SECOND_SIZE], SECOND_SIZE) == 0){
00191         table_type[i] = j;
00192         goto next;
00193       }
00194     }
00195     j = tables_count;
00196     fprintf(stderr, "\b\b\b\b%04d", j);
00197     memcpy(tables[j], &property_type[i*SECOND_SIZE], SECOND_SIZE);
00198     table_type[i] = j;
00199     tables_count++;
00200   next:;
00201   }
00202   fprintf(stderr, "...done\n");
00203 }

00206 void emit_tables(){
00207   uint32_t i;
00208   int j;
00209   int k;
00210   printf("/* \n"
00211          " * This file is automatically generated from UnicodeData.txt\n"
00212          " * using udata-gen.c\n"
00213          " */\n\n");
00214   printf("#include <stdint.h>\n"
00215          "typedef struct udata_entry_t{\n"
00216          "  char category[3];\n"
00217          "  int32_t upper_offset;\n"
00218          "  int32_t lower_offset;\n"
00219          "  int32_t title_offset;\n"
00220          "} udata_entry_t;\n\n");
00221 
00222   printf("#define FIRST_SIZE %d\n", FIRST_SIZE);
00223   printf("#define SECOND_SIZE %d\n\n", SECOND_SIZE);
00224   printf("static unsigned char udata_table_type[] = {\n");
00225   for (i = 0; i < FIRST_SIZE/8; i++){
00226     printf(" ");
00227     for (k = 0; k < 8; k++){
00228       printf(" %5d,", table_type[(i*8)+k]);      
00229     }
00230     printf("\n");
00231   }
00232 
00233   printf("};\n\n");
00234   printf("static unsigned char udata_tables[][%d] = {\n", SECOND_SIZE);
00235   for (i = 0; i < tables_count; i++){
00236     printf("  {\n");
00237     for (j = 0; j < SECOND_SIZE / 8; j++) {
00238       printf("   ");
00239       for (k = 0; k < 8; k++){
00240         printf(" %3d,", tables[i][(j*8)+k]);      
00241       }
00242       printf("\n");
00243     }
00244     printf("  },\n");
00245   }
00246   printf("};\n\n");
00247   printf("static udata_entry_t udata_properties[] = {\n");
00248   for (i = 0; i < distinct_count; i++){
00249     printf("  {\"%c%c\", %d, %d, %d},\n", 
00250            distinct[i].category[0], distinct[i].category[1],
00251            distinct[i].upper_offset, distinct[i].lower_offset,
00252            distinct[i].title_offset);
00253   }
00254   printf("};\n");
00255   printf("#define UDATA_ENTRY(n) \\\n"
00256          "   (udata_properties[udata_tables["
00257          "udata_table_type[((n) / SECOND_SIZE) %% FIRST_SIZE]]"
00258          "[(n) %% SECOND_SIZE]])\n");
00259   printf("#define UDATA_MAX %d\n", FIRST_SIZE*SECOND_SIZE);
00260 }
00261 
00262 int main(int argc, char**argv){
00263   char buf[1024];
00264   init_database();
00265   fprintf(stderr, "Parsing...");  
00266   while(fgets(buf, 1024, stdin)){
00267     process_line(parse_line(buf));
00268   }
00269   fprintf(stderr, "done\n");
00270   compact_props();
00271   compact_tables();
00272   emit_tables();
00273 }
